roleset.name: hirsuit; covered in hair
roleset.note: HAIRY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. (from hairy.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: If this works well I would definitely buy one , I hate shaving and my arms are quite hairy as well -LRB- I do n't shave or bleach them but I am self conscious -RRB- , so I 'd love to be hair free forever .

roleset.name: hazardous, sketchy
roleset.note: HAIRY-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from hairy.02-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: The drive was a little hairy in a few places but we made it!
